title: EcoFlow Debuts its Whole-home Backup Power Solution and Three New Smart Devices at CES 2023 - PR Newswire
summary: EcoFlow is a portable power and eco-friendly energy solutions company. EcoFlow announced four new products at CES 2023: the Whole-home Backup Power Solution, the Wave 2 Portable Air Conditioner, the Blade robotic lawn-sweeping mower, and the Glacier portable refrigerator. Among these products, the Blade robotic lawn-sweeping mower, Glacier portable refrigerator, and the Whole-home Backup Power Solution meet the criteria for green innovation.
green_innovation: TRUE, The Whole-home Backup Power Solution, Blade robotic lawn-sweeping mower, and Glacier portable refrigerator all contribute to environmental sustainability goals, such as reducing energy consumption and emissions.
business_innovation: TRUE, The article describes four products or processes that meet the criteria to be a business innovation: the Whole-home Backup Power Solution, the Wave 2 Portable Air Conditioner, the Blade robotic lawn-sweeping mower, and the Glacier portable refrigerator.
green_product: TRUE, The Blade and Glacier meet the criteria for being green products because they are designed to minimize their environmental impact and promote sustainability.
green_process: FALSE, The article does not describe any processes that meet the criteria for being called a green process.
product_or_process: Whole-home Backup Power Solution, Wave 2 Portable Air Conditioner, Blade robotic lawn-sweeping mower, Glacier portable refrigerator
